alert.note: Alert for East Otter Tail; Wadena (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 11:53AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Wadena and southeastern Otter Tail Counties through 1230 PM CDT... At 1152 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rose City, or 42 miles east of Fergus Falls, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Parkers Prairie around 1155 AM CDT. Wrightstown around 1210 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Wadena, Verndale and Bluffton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
